column1: #text=Last week on a bike ride to my friends house , I was traveling on a very rough road with a lot of rocks on the side of it .
#text=I realized after about 10 minutes into my ride that I had a very bad flat tire .
#text=Thankfully I carry the proper tools and items with me to fix it .
#text=I pulled off the road and opened my bag with my tools .
#text=After removing the tire and the tube inside , I used my tools to put a brand new tube inside of the tire .
#text=I checked it to make sure that I had aligned everything correctly and after ensuring that I did , I placed the tire back onto the bike .
#text=I then used my portable pump to make sure that I had the proper amount of air pressure inside of it , because I did n't want another flat .
#text=After checking everything twice , I was on my way again .
